markdownRemark.html:
문자 배열인 문자열 소개

문자열 (String)

use unordered_multiset to insert and erase duplicate keys (1-1. 완주하지 못한 선수) - use iterator to erase only one and not all duplicate keys - use unordered_map instead if need to count number of duplicates: (key, count) - bcuz duplicate keys are iterated separately in multiset
